content:
I love it! Your Facebook post is concise, informative, and visually appealing. The use of "Typography matters!" as a hook will grab the attention of your audience, and the image will help to illustrate the impact of typography on design. The call-to-action to check out the blog post is clear and direct.

Your Instagram post is also great! The use of "Typography 101" as a title is catchy and educational, and the series of images will help to break down the importance of typography in design in a visually appealing way. The swipe-through format will encourage engagement and make the content more interactive. The call-to-action to read the full blog post is clear, and the use of relevant hashtags will help to increase the post's discoverability.

Some minor suggestions I have are:

* On Facebook, you could add a few more hashtags to reach a wider audience. For example, you could add #graphicdesign, #designinspiration, or #uxdesign.
* On Instagram, you could consider adding a few more visuals to the series to make it more comprehensive. For example, you could add an image that shows a design with poor typography, an image that shows the same design with improved typography, and an image that provides a quote or statistic about the impact of typography on design.

Overall, however, your posts are well-crafted and will likely resonate with your audience. Good job!
